channel.title: Travel on Lucas A. Meyer - Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Lucas A. Meyer - Blog

item.title: Frankfurt - Spring 2018
item.description: I gave two short talks for the 10th Arvato Financial Services Telekommunikationsforum in Baden-Baden. The way ticket prices worked out, it was US$ 1000 cheaper to return on Sunday than it was to return on Saturday, so I was able to spend a full day in Frankfurt. I hope to come back. A great base for European adventures One of the things I liked the most about Frankfurt was how integrated the transportation system was.
